name: Relickeeper

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally ATK in Campaign Battles by 40%.

skills.name: Crusade
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Grants an Extra Turn if the target is killed.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Surging Strength
skills.raw_description:
Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 4 turns. Grants an Extra Turn.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Ageless Endurance
skills.raw_description:
When hit by an enemy, places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
